privacy_description: How we collect, use, and protect your data and your pet's medical records.
data_collection_bullet_1: We collect necessary data to deliver veterinary services (owner details, pet profile, medical records, appointments).
data_collection_bullet_2: Data is used for care delivery, reminders, billing, and service improvement.
data_collection_bullet_3: We practice data minimization: only the data needed for the purpose is collected.
data_sharing_bullet_1: We may share data with trusted providers (labs, specialists, payment processors) to deliver care.
data_sharing_bullet_2: Third parties are required to protect data and use it only for agreed purposes.
data_sharing_bullet_3: We do not sell personal information to advertisers.
security_bullet_1: Encryption in transit (TLS) and at rest for sensitive data where supported.
security_bullet_2: Role-based access control for clinical staff; audit logs for key actions.
security_bullet_3: Session controls: automatic timeouts and device-based session validation.
security_bullet_4: Regular backups and disaster recovery procedures.
access_bullet_1: You can request access to your account and pet records.
access_bullet_2: You may correct inaccuracies and request data export where feasible.
access_bullet_3: You can request account deletion subject to clinical and regulatory obligations.
retention_bullet_1: Medical records are retained for the period required by local regulations and clinical standards.
retention_bullet_2: Non-essential data is retained only as long as necessary for the stated purpose.
retention_bullet_3: When deletion is requested, we remove or anonymize data as permitted by law.
auth_bullet_1: Use strong, unique passwords; do not share login credentials.
auth_bullet_3: You can review and revoke active sessions from your account settings.
telehealth_bullet_1: Telemedicine sessions are conducted over secure channels.
telehealth_bullet_2: Recordings, if any, require explicit consent and are stored securely.
telehealth_bullet_3: Clinical notes from telehealth are part of the medical record.
incidents_bullet_1: We investigate and notify affected users of material security incidents as required.
incidents_bullet_2: We may disclose information when legally required (e.g., court orders).
incidents_bullet_3: Questions or concerns can be directed to the clinic's privacy contact.
appointment_reminders_subtitle: Receive reminders and care instructions for upcoming visits.
marketing_communications_subtitle: Get promotions, updates, and educational content.
analytics_improvements_subtitle: Allow anonymized usage data to help improve the app.
telehealth_recording_consent_subtitle: Permit recording of telemedicine sessions when applicable.
acknowledge_privacy_policy: By continuing, you acknowledge the Privacy & Security policy.
disclaimer: Disclaimer: This Privacy & Security summary is for general guidance and does not constitute legal advice. Requirements vary by region and clinic. Veterinary records may be subject to local regulations; contact your clinic for details.
data_export_message: We'll prepare a copy of your account and pet records (where available). This may include appointments, invoices, and clinical notes.
delete_account_message: Deleting your account removes access and schedules deletion of personal data subject to clinical and legal retention requirements. Continue?
terms_description: Please review our policies and services to ensure the best care for your pet.
appointments_bullet_1: Appointments can be booked via the app or phone. Please arrive 10 minutes early.
appointments_bullet_2: Cancellations within 24 hours may incur a fee to compensate reserved time.
appointments_bullet_3: Emergency cases are prioritized and may affect schedule times.
treatment_bullet_1: By booking services, you consent to examination and clinically indicated diagnostics.
treatment_bullet_2: Surgical or anesthesia procedures require signed consent; risks will be explained.
treatment_bullet_3: We maintain and store your pet's medical records. You may request copies as permitted by local regulations.
medications_bullet_1: Prescriptions are issued at the clinician's discretion based on medical need.
medications_bullet_2: For refills, a valid doctor-patient-pet relationship and recent exam may be required.
medications_bullet_3: Always follow dosage instructions; report adverse reactions immediately.
telemedicine_bullet_1: Telehealth is suitable for triage, follow-ups, and general guidance; it may not replace an in-person exam.
telemedicine_bullet_2: If a physical exam is required, you'll be advised to visit the clinic.
telemedicine_bullet_3: Video quality, lighting, and accurate history improve remote assessment.
payments_bullet_1: We accept major payment methods. Full payment is due at the time services are provided.
payments_bullet_2: Estimates are provided for procedures; actual costs may vary based on clinical needs.
payments_bullet_3: Refunds are assessed case-by-case for services not rendered.
privacy_bullet_1: We protect client and pet data according to applicable privacy laws.
privacy_bullet_2: Data may be used to improve services, schedule reminders, and communicate follow-ups.
privacy_bullet_3: You may request account deletion or data export subject to regulatory requirements.
emergency_bullet_1: For life-threatening emergencies, seek immediate care at the nearest 24/7 facility.
emergency_bullet_2: All care is provided in line with veterinary standards; outcomes may vary based on the pet's condition.
emergency_bullet_3: The clinic is not liable for complications arising from undisclosed medical history or non-compliance with instructions.
terms_disclaimer: Disclaimer: These terms provide general guidance for veterinary services and are not legal advice. Policies may vary by region and clinic. Please consult the clinic directly for detailed terms.
by_continuing_agree: By continuing, you agree to these terms.
payment_confirmation_message: Are you sure you want to proceed with payment?
ready_to_care: Ready to care for your pet today?
add_some_amazing_products: Add some amazing products to get started!
are_you_sure_to_place_order_without_onli: Are you sure you want to place this order? Payment will be collected upon delivery.
cart_is_empty_to_order: Your cart is empty. Add items before placing an order.
failed_to_place_order: Failed to place order. Please try again.
